ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: COLD_OPEN
text: COLD OPEN

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: 2:00 AM

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: On a Friday

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: Philadelphia, PA Over black, we hear TROPICAL MUSIC.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: INT. PADDY’S PUB - CLOSING TIME (N1)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: CHARLIE, FRANK and DEE wear Hawaiian shirts as they close up the bar. They dance lazily along to the music. DENNIS finishes counting out the register.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Okay, that about does it. Which means... we're officially on island time.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dennis dons a CAPTAIN’S HAT. Dee and Charlie HIGH-FIVE.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Oh man. I cannot wait for this concert. Thanks for buying the tickets, Frank.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You kidding? I love Jimmy Buffett. Those Parrothead broads are wild.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I hope he plays the pifia colada song.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, he won’t. Cuz that’s not Buffett.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yes, it des

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: If you like pina coladas...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I know the song. It’s sung by a man named Rupert Holmes.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You sure it’s not Buffett? It feels like it should be.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We’ve been going to Buffett for twenty years. Have you ever heard him play it?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: No, but he doesn’t always play all his hits every time.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yes, he does. That’s the only thing he does. And that’s not one of them. But request away. I won’t stop you.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The vibe could not be more chill.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Did you guys just disagree without fighting? That’s new.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s the power of Buffett. It’s five o'clock somewhere, right?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: CHARLIE/ FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Totally./Fins up!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Just then, MAC exits from the women’s restroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: If you like making love at midnight. And you've got half a brain.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s my bathroom! You can’t use my bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Why not?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Because it’s for women. And you’re a man.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, I’m a gay man, and I feel more comfortable in the ladies bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, that makes me uncomfortable.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, I’m uncomfortable with you being uncomfortable. It’s kinda homophobic. In fact, the whole men’s and women’s bathroom thing is antiquated.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You're antiquated!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Okay, settle down. This always happens: we get into a tiff right before Buffett and spend the whole concert screaming at each other. Ruins the whole island vibe.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The others MURMUR agreement. That does happen.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, not this time. We’re not heading to Buffett with any petty unsolved issues.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dennis heads for the door.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Guys, this whole bathroom issue is a simple problem with a simple solution. There’s no reason that anyone needs to feel uncomfortable in the bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We've got eighteen hours until the concert starts, so I say... we figure it out now.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dennis LOCKS the front door, dramatically. After a beat:

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Dennis, you know we can still open that door, right? You haven’t locked us in.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It was symbolic. I was going for dramatic effect, but now you’ve ruined it, so... It’s ruined.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The Gang stands there for an awkward beat.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CULT TO:

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAIN TITLES

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: “THE GANG SOLVES THE BATHROOM PROBLEM”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: “IT’S ALWAYS SUNNY IN PHILADELPHIA”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: 2 INT. PADDY’S PUB - MOMENTS LATER (N1)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The Gang unpacks bags of CHINESE FOOD.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Now we’re talking. There’s never been a problem so big it can’t be solved with a late night and a little Chinese takeout.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I feel like we should’ve gotten cheeseburgers.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I’m gonna save my cheeseburgers for paradise.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: GANG

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Good point./Good call./Me too.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I'd like to start. If there are no objections.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The others mutter no objections.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Okay. I should be able to use the women's bathroom because I am a gay man, and therefore most comfortable around women.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Mmm. Why?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: A) We both like dudes, and B) we both find women’s bodies disgusting, so there’s no hanky panky.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Makes sense to me. That checks out.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: May I counter?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: The floor is yours.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: A) Not all women like dudes. Lesbians, boom. And B) you’re disgusting. I don’t want men pooping next to me.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Okay, let’s keep it civil. Now just to be clear, Dee, you want the genders to remain separate.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: 1 ao.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Oh, so you wouldn't let a trans woman use your bathroom?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Of course I would!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: But f can "“c.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: No! Because you’re a gay man. You should use the men’s bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I don’t know why you’re suddenly being such a bitch about this. It never bothered you before.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What are you talking about?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I’ve been in the stall next to you a bunch of times. I know, because I recognized your pink heels.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I don’t own pink heels.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yes you do. The pink, strappy ones that somehow make your giant feet look smaller. You know the ones.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I really don’t.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I... think I can explain this.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: SMASH CUT TO:

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: 3 INT. PADDY’S PUB - WOMEN’S BATHROOM - LATER (N1)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Everyone but Charlie stands outside the stalls. This is the first time we’ve seen inside the women’s bathroom and

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: it is SHOCKINGLY CLEAN.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Charlie, I hope the explaining you’re going to do is about why this bathroom is so much cleaner than ours.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Frank pushes the lever of a soap dispenser.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Ugh! Something oozed on my hand. Is that fungus?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s soap, Frank.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Right outta the wall? Since when?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Don’t touch anything, okay? This is the last time you’re going to be in here.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dee KNOCKS on the stall door.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: C'mon, Charlie. What’s taking so long?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dee bends down to look under the stall.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What in the...?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The others look under the stall door to see Charlie's feet, strapped into PINK HEELS.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s them! The pink heels!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE (0.S.)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I can explain.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Charlie, you a crossdresser?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE (0.S.)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: No, it’s just-- I like to use the ladies’ room, because it’s quieter, less crowded--

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: --it’s actually clean.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That, too. But I don’t want to make the women uncomfortable, so I wear the heels.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Mac peeks over the top of the door.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Okay, the heels I get. But why the wig?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You’re really gonna make me go through the whole thing? Fine.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Charlie exits the stall. He’s wearing PINK HEELS, a BLONDE WIG, and a FLOWERY SUNDRESS over his clothes.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: The wig is in case anyone peeks over the door.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: And the dress?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: The dress pulls the whole look together.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You are a crossdresser!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: No I’m not. Look, I was raised by a single mom. And sometimes we'd be out at a mall or a stadium or whatever and I'd have to use the bathroom, but my mom wouldn’t let me use the men’s all by myself so she’d carry around a dress for me to wear so I could follow her into the ladies’ room and now I’ve been doing it for so many years that I guess I’m just more comfortable pooping this way. Whatever, I guess I identify as a woman when I’m pooping. It’s not that weird.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It’s pretty weird./So weird!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Lots of people do it.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Nobody does that./You’re the only one.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Weird or not, it does bring up an interesting point: Dee, you said only moments ago that you would let a transgender woman use your bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yeah, and?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dennis GESTURES to Charlie.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE (CONT’D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: No way. Charlie’s not transgender.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: No, he’s not. But he identifies as a woman, when he’s pooping.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s not the same thing.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Isn't it? He feels like a woman. He’s got the wig, the shoes, the dress. I bet she’s even got a name.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I don’t see what that has to do with--

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What's her name, Charlie?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: A long PAUSE.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Joyce.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: There it is.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It’s a pretty name.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: So, I propose that, for the sake of Joyce and others like her, we make both bathrooms available to all genders.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What?! No! You’re only saying that because you want to use my bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I am not. I think Mac’s right. Our

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: PAGE_HEADER
text: “ current system is antiquated and-- Is

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: that a hand dryer?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: REVEAL a HAND DRYER on the wall. Dennis goes to it.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Let's vote. All those in favor?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: All the men raise their hands.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Goddamnit.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Great work, guys. I knew we could solve it. And we still have plenty of time to get a good night's sleep before Buffett.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We should probably update the signs.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Right. Okay. Just gotta quickly update the signs that it’s clear that any gender can use any bathroom. How hard can that

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: \ be? TITLE: “HOURS LATER...”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: 4 INT. PADDY’S PUB - NIGHT (N1)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The Gang stands outside the bathroom doors. Charlie’s no longer in the dress. The old signs are gone and Dennis holds up a new sign: a GENDER NEUTRAL sign with a half- male, half-female stick figure, plus a person in a wheelchair and a baby that appears to be floating.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What’s wrong with this one again?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Too busy.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Mmm. It’s confusing.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Why is the baby floating? Is that wheelchair guy throwing babies around? We can’t have that.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: The baby is the symbol for a changing table.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I ripped those out. We can’t have babies to the bar. It’s unsanitary.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I agree. Babies are filthy.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Fine, we’ll get rid of the baby.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dennis puts his hand over the baby symbol.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS (CONT’D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: How about now?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

label: DIALOGUE
text: Great. All those in favor?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Mac and Dee raise their hands.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Charlie, raise your hand. You’re on our side, because of the whole Joyce thing.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yeah, Charlie. Do it for Joyce.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: i don’t know...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Hold on now. Think about this, Charlie. There’s no shame in doing what’s best for the majority. That’s what a democracy is. Trying to please the greatest number of people.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: White people.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Please don’t help. Look, we can’t please everybody. We all want our own version of paradise. I like mine with lettuce and tomato, Heinz 57 and French-fried potatoes. But that’s me. Some people like their cheeseburgers with pineapple.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The others REACT to this: gross.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Exactly! Now does that mean that we should offer pineapple in every hamburger store? Of course not.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: They should take it/off pizza, too! The Hawaiians are savages!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Frank, I’m doing a-- I hate when you’re on my side.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We cannot let the tyranny of the minority oppress the majority. We cannot let the select few dictate how to have our cheeseburgers. Or our bathrooms.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Wow, those words make a lotta sense.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Look, the whole Majority Rules thing might have worked in Medieval times, but we live in a society now. And a society is judged by how it treats its most vulnerable people. We have to speak for those who can’t speak for themselves.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: And that’s why--

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Shut up, Dee, I’m talking! We have to protect the most marginalized among us. So I say we change our attitudes, we change our latitudes, and we vote for a “Minorities Only” bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Mmm-hmm. His words make more sense, too.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: All those in favor of doing the right thing and giving minorities the good bathroom?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Mac, Dee, and Charlie start to raise their hands when:

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Wait!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I just looked up the demographics of Philly. It says here this city is 54 percent women and 68 percent Christian. That means Mac and Dee are in the majority.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What? That can’t be right.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: He grabs Frank’s phone to check.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It also says this town is 52% black, which means white men like Dennis and I are the real minorities.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: So we should get the good bathroom!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Goddamnit.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: But I’m gay! That’s a minority.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Are you more gay than you are Catholic?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I don’t know. They’re at war.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Mac hands Frank back his phone.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What does it say about transgenders?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Less than 1 percent.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Right. So that would make me...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: The minority.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Right. And that would mean...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You explain it to him. Because I can’t.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It means you get the good bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Awesome!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: All those in favor of doing the actual right thing, and giving the real minorities the good bathroom?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Charlie, Dennis, and Frank all raise their hands. Mac and Dee begrudgingly join them.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It’s unanimous. White non-Christian men get the good bathroom.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: At last.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: So that’s it? We can go to Buffett now?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yes we can. And if we hurry up, we can still fit in a little tailgating.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I’1l bring the grill. Who wants cheeseburgers?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: They head toward the door. But Mac and Dee DON’T MOVE.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We're not going.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: You used Buffett’s words to promote discrimination, dude. That’s not right.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: But you have to go! You two are the only other real Parrotheads of the bunch.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Frank’s only there for the chicks and Charlie doesn’t even know the songs!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Hey! I know the songs.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Aruba, Jamaica, oh I want to take ya--

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That's Beach Boys! That’s the Beach Boys!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: He’s right. There’s no point in going to Buffett if we don’t all go together.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Then I guess we’re not going to Buffett.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: A SOMBER SILENCE as this realization sinks in.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: “ONE HOUR TO BUFFETT...”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: 10 INT. PADDY’S PUB - DUSK (D2) 10

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The Gang sits at the bar, drinking. The good vibes of the Cold Open are gone. After a sad moment:

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: If you like pina coladas...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Please, Charlie. It’s too painful.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: CHARLIE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: But you said it’s not Buffett.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It’s close enough.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Have you guys ever listened to the lyrics of that song? It’s super dark.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DEE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: What?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yeah. It’s about a guy trying to cheat on his wife. The song starts “I was tired of my lady, we'd been together too long.”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: PAGE_HEADER
text: { Really? It seems like such a happy song.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: PAGE_HEADER
text: - I mean, who doesn’t like pina coladas?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Uh, I don’t. As a woman on-the-go, I can’t waste precious time waiting for my drink to thaw.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: See, as a straight man, I enjoy pifia coladas. But I hate getting caught in the rain. It flattens my hair and you all know how good I look in leather.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: They agree. He does.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: How about making love at midnight? As a senior citizen, I can’t get it up past six, six-thirty.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, as a straight man who poops transgender, I don’t have any desire to go to Aruba or Jamaica for that matter.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: OTHER
text: be

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s not a thing, right?/Never was./Not the song.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: I guess when you get right down to it we all identify very different... out here. But you know what? We’re not so different...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: He points to the bathrooms.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: MAC (CONT'D)

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: ...in there. In there we’re all the same.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: DENNIS

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yeah, behind those doors we’re all disgusting. Vulnerable. Ashamed.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FRANK

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Like a bunch of filthy animals dumping in a shithouse.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We're all animals. It’s the only common thread between a peasant and a king. Everyone has to shit.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We've been trying to make everyone comfortable in that shithouse, but the truth is, whatever your identity is, no one is ever, ever comfortable shitting next to someone else.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: But if everyone is going to be uncomfortable sharing the bathroom, then how can we solve the problem?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Well, I guess the only thing we can do is... recognize that in there we’re all the same and that we should just treat other people how we’d like to be treated.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: This last part BLOWS EVERYONE AWAY.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Whoa, Dee.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Did you just make that up?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Yeah. I guess I did.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Is that in the Constitution?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: It feels like it should be, right?

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Hey, guys. I think I might have a solution to our bathroom problem.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: TITLE: “FIVE MINUTES LATER...”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: SCENE_HEADING
text: aL INT. PADDY’S PUB - FIVE MINUTES LATER - DUSK (D2) i:

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: Dennis finishes hanging a NEW BATHROOM SIGN. We don’t see what it is, but the rest of the gang looks pleased.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: That’s it!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Can’t argue with that.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: We did it.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Hey, if we hurry, we can still make it to Buffett!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: Let’s go!

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The Gang heads for the door. Good vibes all around.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: If you like pina coladas...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: DIALOGUE
text: And getting caught in the rain.

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The rest of the Gang JOINS IN, singing this new Buffett classic. As they go, we hang on the bathroom doors. There’s a sign hung on each which reads...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TITLE
text: “ANIMAL SHITHOUSE”

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: ACTION
text: The song continues as we...

ep_name: The Gang Solves the Bathroom Problem_converted
label: TRANSITION
text: FADE OUT.
